heading: Exercise Desert Hunt 2025 Concludes Successfully
description: An integrated Tri-Service Special Forces exercise named Exercise Desert Hunt 2025 was conducted by the Indian Air Force at Air Force Station Jodhpur from 24 to 28 February 2025. The exercise involved elite Para (Special Forces) from the Indian Army, the Marine Commandos from the Indian Navy along with the Garud (Special Forces) from the Indian Air Force, participating together in a simulated combat environment.

heading: IIT-BHU Collaborates with Govt for 'Vision 2047'
description: An interactive session was hosted at IIT-BHU in collaboration with government officials under the 'Viksit Uttar Pradesh - Samarth Uttar Pradesh @2047' initiative, aiming to make Uttar Pradesh a developed and globally respected state by 2047 through inclusive growth, technological advancement, sustainable development, and citizen engagement.

heading: Chhattisgarh HC Strikes Down Direct Recruitment of Medical Professors
description: The Chhattisgarh High Court has invalidated a state government notification that allowed direct recruitment of professors and associate professors in government medical colleges, deeming it illegal and inconsistent with established service rules.

heading: ENSF to Launch 2nd Phase Stir for Retention of Teachers
description: The Eastern Naga Students' Federation (ENSF) is set to launch the second phase of its agitation to demand the retention and regularization of teachers under the Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA) and Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA) in Nagaland.

heading: CM Advocates Industry-Centric Curriculum at Bhonsala Defence University
description: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis emphasized the need to create an industry-centric curriculum tailored to the nation's growing defence sector at an interactive session hosted by Bhonsala Defence University in Nagpur.

heading: Satya Srinivas Appointed India's Executive Director at ADB
description: L. Satya Srinivas, who was serving as the Special Secretary in the Ministry of Commerce, has been appointed as the Executive Director representing India at the Asian Development Bank (ADB).

heading: UGC Draft Regulations 2025 for Faculty Recruitment
description: The UGC's Draft Regulations 2025 proposes significant changes in faculty recruitment, focusing on flexibility, inclusivity, and eliminating score-based shortlisting.

description: An integrated Tri-Service Special Forces exercise named Exercise Desert Hunt 2025 was conducted by the Indian Air Force at Air Force Station Jodhpur from 24 to 28 February 2025. The exercise involved elite Para (Special Forces) from the Indian Army, the Marine Commandos from the Indian Navy along with the Garud (Special Forces) from the Indian Air Force, participating together in a simulated combat environment.

heading: UGC Draft Regulations 2025 for Faculty Recruitment
description: Based on recent news, the UGC's Draft Regulations for Faculty Recruitment, 2025 have become a significant topic of discussion within India's academic community. The most debated provision is the proposal to make a PhD a mandatory requirement for the direct recruitment of Assistant Professors in universities.
